posts.title: 使用jsp和servlet时遇到的坑
posts.text: Servlet与jsp关联在WEB-INF创建下表1234567891011<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><web-app xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee" xsi:schemaLocation="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_2_5.xsd" version="2.5"> <servlet> <servlet-name>Servlet</servlet-name> <servlet-class>com.MWebServer.Servlet</servlet-class> </servlet> <servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>Servlet</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/MWebServer/Servlet</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping></web-app> 在表单中使用action绑定123456<form action="Servlet" method="POST"> 用户名：<input type="text" name="username"/><br> 密码：<input type="password" name="password"/><br> <br><input type="submit"/> <input type="hidden" name="case" value="login"/></form> 使用session在重定向页面后获取参数在GET函数中向Session添加参数123456protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException { ... request.getsession().setAttribute(...,...); response.sendRedirect(...); ...} 在jsp中调用1<%String data=(String)session.getAttribute("data"); out.print(data);%> 在GET函数中取得全部input,生成map12345678910Map<String, String> res = new HashMap<String, String>(); Enumeration<?> temp = request.getParameterNames(); if (null != temp) { while (temp.hasMoreElements()) { String en = (String) temp.nextElement(); String value =request.getParameter(en); res.put(en, value); if (null == res.get(en) || "".equals(res.get(en))) { res.remove(en); }}}
